cv: "\xc2\xa0 Corina Conroy OCrona@yahoo.com (123)345.7890 k\xe2\x80\x8barimvarela.com ________________________________________________________________________ SUMMARY \xe2\x97\x8f \xe2\x97\x8f \xe2\x97\x8f \xe2\x97\x8f \xe2\x97\x8f Demonstrated software architect with incredible ability to lead projects to completion.
